email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN BREEZE (DWT: 150,000, LOA: 280m) available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. The cargo size is 120,000MT on CIF terms. The starting freight quote is USD 22.50 per ton. Laycan is 1-5 December. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Sarah Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the offer. USD 22.50 seems a bit high compared to the current market rates. Can you revise the rate to USD 20.00 per ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Alex Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I can offer USD 21.00 per ton, which is a significant reduction from our initial quote. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 21.00 is better, but we are still looking for a rate closer to USD 20.50. Can you meet us halfway? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 2-6 December?

Best regards,
Alex Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I can offer USD 20.75 per ton, and the laycan can be adjusted to 2-6 December. Please confirm if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Sarah Johnson

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 20.75 per ton works for us. Please send the summary of terms for our review.

Best regards,
Alex Miller

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Here is the summary of terms:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN BREEZE
- Cargo: 120,000MT Coal
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Laycan: 2-6 December
- Freight: USD 20.75 per ton
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Sarah Johnson
